subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Trudging through the rain-soaked quagmire of Heinz Field, the Pittsburgh Steelers defeated the visiting Miami Dolphins by 3-0 last night when Jeff Reed kicked a 24-yard field goal with 17 seconds left. It was the lowest scoring N.F.L. game in 14 years.
